mapper.select: select a.reserve_id, a.rdate, a.animal_id, a.hospital_id, a.status, a.user_email, b.aname, c.name from reserve a, animal b, hospital c, zalbazo_user d where a.animal_id = b.animal_id and c.hospital_id = a.hospital_id and c.hospital_id = d.hospital_id and d.user_email = #{userEmail}

select a.reserve_id, a.rdate, a.animal_id, a.hospital_id, a.status, a.user_email, b.aname, c.name from reserve a, animal b, hospital c where a.animal_id = b.animal_id and c.hospital_id = a.hospital_id and a.reserve_id = #{reserveId}
